customer_reviews.title: Works great but only 1/4 will do!
customer_reviews.text: So I am an adult and one of these knocks me out in about 20 min and I have a great sleep. Thankfully it turned out ok, but they were able to get the bottle open somehow at just 4 years old and my twins ate about 3/4 of the bottle thinking they were candy. Called poison control and they are fine, but yeah that was scary. Make sure you keep them locked up.

customer_reviews.text: Have only used two times, first time my 3yo woke up screaming in the middle of the night. Second time my 6yo woke up with a stomach ache and then threw up. So not worth these issues, was hopeful but not going to give anymore.
customer_reviews.author: The Ewell Household

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: After having my third child, been exhausted most of the time, and refusing to use the help... I have finally decided to give it a try. All I have to say is, give it a try and you will be amazed. My kids go to bed within half an hour of taking it and I get to take care of myself. They used to wake up every two hours and ended up waking up in my bed with us, which as a married couple is not the ideal situation. After trying this product, I will have to say it has helped me to the point that even I sleep better and get to spend more quality time with my husband.
customer_reviews.author: ReAl

customer_reviews.title: Worth Trying!
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are very effective at getting my kiddo to relax and fall asleep peacefully and then to sleep peacefully through the night. We only give them to him if he is fighting bedtime or a nap. 1/4 of a gummy is plenty. A full one is actually too much in my opinion. Will definitely be purchasing again (and again) to help maintain a healthy nap & nighttime sleep schedule with my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter was struggling to fall asleep and stay asleep. This was affecting her performance at school and her temperament. We were concerned about giving her this product for fear that it may interfere with REM sleep. We spoke with our pediatrician and he assured us that this small dosage would not have such effect and could be used long term if needed. We give her one a night and she falls asleep within 20 min and stays asleep for the entire night. She is well rested in the morning and is doing great in school and her temperament I still back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Bee's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nightmares
customer_reviews.text: Both of our daughters had horrible nightmares, we switch to Creekside and Young living with much better results
customer_reviews.author: jhlr

customer_reviews.title: This is the brand that my kid likes the best and seems to help a bit
customer_reviews.text: We've tried some other brands, Sam's club, Target, and our kid would eat them but say they weren't that good. He actually LIKES these, and it seems to help settle him down after a bit. Whether it's the gummy or just the routine I don't know, but I've learned to just accept it that he's asleep! Packaging is a little annoying as the bottle is clear but wrapped with the label, and most times the label just tears off when I open the package the first time. Not a big deal, just sharpie what it is on the bottle and we're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: CLTGUY

customer_reviews.title: Great for bedtime training
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter is usually out within 30 minutes but sometimes I get up after an hour and a half and come to my bed. She is almost 4 years old but we are trying to get her ready for school. she does not usually go to sleep till 1030 and with these we can get in bed by 8:30
customer_reviews.author: three sons and a daughter

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: This solved our troubles of trying to get our 2 year old to stay in his bed and go to sleep. My son weighs 25lb and we have been giving him 1 tablet when necessary, about 30 minutes before bed. It kicks in FAST, so if you give it too early, it can cause super fussiness from feeling so sleepy. I have noticed that sometimes when we use it, he seems to have worse dreams, waking up scared. He also has a harder time napping during the day if we use it several nights in a row.
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaMamaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Falls asleep fast
customer_reviews.text: Having a child with ADHD and accompanying sleep problems, I was happy to find something to help her wind down enough to fall asleep. This stuff really works to put her to sleep. She is fast asleep within 30 minutes of taking it, when typically it takes her around an hour and a half. The problem I have with it is that she then wakes up in the middle of the night, which she usually doesn't. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: T New

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: These work like a charm! We don’t use them every night. I’d say an average of 3 nights a week when we can see our 4 year old just isn’t going to settle down for the evening to get the rest he needs for the night. He take his “nighttime vitamin” after bath time and the yawns start coming about 10 minutes later! He wakes in the morning refreshed and ready for the day! We especially appreciate the product living in the Pacific Northwest given the loooong summer days we have. It’s hard for a little guy to understand it is bedtime when it’s still light out as late as 10pm!
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Swede

customer_reviews.title: Great way to wind down our hyper 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son bounces off the walls around bed time. Getting him to cooperate with the night time routine was like pulling teeth. These little guys have made a huge difference. We're on our 2nd bottle, giving our son a gummy nightly. He seems to wind down gradually, sleeps more soundly, and doesn't show any signs of grogginess in the morning. THANK YOU ZARBEE'S !
customer_reviews.author: Jesse West

customer_reviews.title: Works well and quick.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. My daughter was having trouble sleeping and she really struggled getting up for school each morning. I ordered this product and we have been able to get some rest and she has has more energy and has been feeling better in general throughout the say since it is very important for little ones to get proper rest. Thank you! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: God bless the friend who recommended this to me. We recently received a foster placement of three preschoolers. The first week and a half, no one got any rest, for so many reasons. Since my friend recommended these, willingly go to bed most nights, and sleep through 95% of them! We have been taking them for about four weeks, with doctor's approval, since the actual dose of melatonin is so low.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old takes this and go back to her regular routine. It’s like a candy to her. It does not do anything at all. She will still be up at 1am. I up the dose to 2 gummies and still nothing. It probably gave her more energy. I was told to try the vicks brand so hopefully it will help. Base in reviews this one seems to work for most kids. Even give some nightmares... but has no effect at all on my little one.... they are not expired either 🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Nastassia lee

customer_reviews.title: It's like magic
customer_reviews.text: We were seriously at wit's end. The bedtime process would take hours, and he would always get out of bed like a lightning bolt full of energy. One pill of this, and he's down 45 minutes later. He even likes to chew/suck on it because of the flavor. Our stress levels are much better since we've been using this!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Richard Cook

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. My 3yo goes through periods where she just cannot settle down for bed even though we follow the exact routine every night - pee, brush teeth, read a book, lights out. Normally she is asleep within 10 mins but if she is still awake and talking to herself in 30-45 mins I give her one of these and she is out within 10. If she seemed super riled up I will just give her one before book time and I can see her relaxing and getting sleepy by the end. These are also super useful for transitions like a new bed or room to keep routines on schedule.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them and they work great!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 kids love these. 2 are on ADHD meds and their pediatrician said to try melatonin. These have been fantastic!! We usually give them 5-20 minutes before bed, seems like the earlier you give them the more likely they are to cooperate and just go to sleep. We tried others that tasted horrible, while I'm not sure these are "berry" flavored the kids still like them! My other kiddo takes these once in awhile but likes them as well. Amazon has them cheaper than we can find locally, so it works for us!!
customer_reviews.author: Josie S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Will be subscribing! My daughter is a natural born night owl like myself (3rd shifter here). She's at home with her father while I'm at work and he reports she doesn't go to sleep until after midnight....she's just now 8. She has been like this since she was 3. We tried melatonin tablets prior to this when she was younger and it gave her horrible night terrors, therefore we immediately stopped using. This has the perfect amount. She was out by 9pm and had no night terrors! This is a life saver. I also started using them when I can't fall asleep in the AM, 3 knocks me out.
customer_reviews.author: Arica Quesnel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes melatonin and swears by it. Our 2.5 year old had developed a horrible habit of taking over an hour to fall asleep at night. I ordered these in desperation of knowing she needed more sleep, but being unable to help her get to sleep early enough. Gave this to her the first night and she fell asleep within 15 minutes, which she hadn't done in weeks. So happy to have found these!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I love zarbees
customer_reviews.text: Zarbees is overall a very good quality brand, I have used many of their products for my baby before... but it is my first time trying this . My baby is on the spectrum and is hyper active so sometimes I need help to get her to bed ...she loves the flavor and usually after at least 30 minutes of eating this she manages to get some sleep. I give it to her just on extreme cases since I don’t think this is made as a permanent solution but am aid in some cases when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: A safe good solution for kids that have a hard time shutting down to go to sleep
customer_reviews.text: Our six-year-old was a preemie in the NICU for 3 months. She has always had a hard time shutting down to go to sleep at night. We started giving her one of these with a Flintstones vitamin right before we read books for bedtime. She does not act groggy or drowsy at all. These are not sedatives. They just seemed to somehow help her drift off into a nice natural well-rested sleep. We checked with our pediatrician and he says these are perfectly safe in this dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern Lady

customer_reviews.title: Sleep, sleep, sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. My 5 year old daughter has a hard time going to be at a decent time. When we first got the product, I told my wife I would try it to just in case something was in it that wasn’t on the label. As an adult it tell you to take 3 and before you knew it I was asleep within 40 mins after taking it. We don’t give it to my daughter every night only on nights where she has gone past 10pm. The bottle does suggest not to take the gummy for 14 consecutive days. Don’t want to depend to much on it to always go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm! No groggy, grumpy kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product!! I’ve used it many times when I needed my girls to get to sleep on time for something. It works like a charm and they’re NOT groggy or grumpy the next morning. If you’re a parent who’s struggling to set a bedtime routine or even just need something to help get your kiddo to sleep if they’re not feeling well or have nights where they just CANT wind-down ect...This product is amazing. So thankful for it. I have 4 kids and I swear by it!
customer_reviews.author: Sdupreebemis

customer_reviews.title: magic
customer_reviews.text: My child has a lot of trouble "turning off" at night, and with our pediatrician's okay we decided to try melatonin, because sleep deprivation was becoming a problem. I really appreciate that these come in 1mg gummies, because everything else we could find had more per gummy, and we want to start with a very small amount. The recommended dosage is more than one gummy but for our child we find that 1 works just fine. I say magic tongue in cheek, because in the end it's brain chemistry and science. Freaking magical science.
customer_reviews.author: RSK

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my kids. My son in particular, he has trouble falling asleep. I take melatonin so I looked up melatonin for kids. The first night both kids took it. They didn't fall asleep. My sun hates the taste and refuses to take them again. There is only 1 mg of melatonin per gummy and I'm just not sure its enough to help them sleep. My daughter and son are both around 70 lbs. The label says not to exceed 2 gummies. The price is more than what I've paid for my melatonin by 4 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: M:)

customer_reviews.title: It only works if she eats it ... and she knows it
customer_reviews.text: In order unfortunately have to try to convince / con your child into chewing a tab. If she knows what you're trying to achieve then it's even more difficult. Have you ever seen a child spit a chewable out of a peanut butter and jelly sandwich before because I have. Good luck and may the odds be ever in your favor
customer_reviews.author: maystarwind

customer_reviews.title: Helps tire them out.
customer_reviews.text: Have a kid that knowingly gets annoying cranky before bedtime? Want to deliver the final (yet gentle) K.O.? Toss one of these in your child’s mouth and tell them it’s their nightly multivitamin, play a board game or read a book and then see their eyelids become heavy. You’ll be closer to your evening drink before you know it. They’re not habit forming (the gummies, not your drink), and our kid thinks they taste great! You won’t regret this wonderful creation from Zarbee’s!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Seriously if you want some me time give these to your kids!
customer_reviews.text: This has honestly been a life saver for me. Just pop one of these bad boys in your child's mouth and wait 30 min. They get sleepy and actually WANT to sleep. Who would have thought my 3 year old actually wants to go to bed at 8 pm? The melatonin is pretty low perfect for a child. They also taste wonderful as I have personally tried and approved. So if you want to watch some rad movies or do some astrophysics at night, then these are a must!
customer_reviews.author: Chao ChaoTop Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting those littles to sleep!
customer_reviews.text: These work like a charm! My daughter since she was little would occasionally have troubles falling asleep or would wake up in the middle of the night and couldn't fall back asleep. I keep these on hand for those moments. She gets better rest with them and loves the flavor. This size bottle lasts us a while since it isn't something we use nightly. I also feel good about using this product because I trust Zarbee's brand. We love all their products! It has definitely been a lifesaver for us!
customer_reviews.author: pippsqueak

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 children, ages 9, 6, and 3; my 3 year old loves these but he only gets them every now and then but within 15 min he is already rubbing his eyes and is out within 30 min. It shocks me every time. My 6 year old doesn’t like the flavor and rarely takes them but they also seem to help him calm down at night. My 9 year old very rarely takes them but she is fine with the taste, I am not sure how effective they are on her because she is already a pretty good sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver -Won’t be without
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the money. Can’t even get close to the value at any local stores here. Works wonders for my son. He comes back and forth between mom and dads and the transition is always tough. This is so nice to have to help him relax and sleep those first nights back home into school life routine. Also great after long no school breaks to get back on track. Often take halves or quarters if we need -don’t have to take a full pill to get benefits
customer_reviews.author: Jake Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Falls asleep faster
customer_reviews.text: My son who is almost 6 years old was having major issues falling asleep at night. It would take him hours to finally call it a night. Now he takes one gummy about 30 minutes before bed and becomes tired quickly. He has no problem with the taste he seems to like it. This has helped my son tremendously. He falls asleep much quicker and gets good quality sleep. I would recommend this product to all parents whose little ones have trouble getting or staying asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used to take 1.5 hours to put to sleep after bedtime! Now we give this to her a half hour before bedtime and she’s asleep within 15-30 minutes after bedtime. She loves the flavor so there’s no fighting her to take I which is a huge benefit! We are on our 3rd bottle now and will continue to get this brand.
customer_reviews.author: MyReviews

customer_reviews.title: Help kids transition back to sleeping routine.
customer_reviews.text: We finished our 1st bottle.. And now ordered 2nd one. We only use it during the 1st few weeks of back to school.. since kids have been sleeping late during school break. We think that this will help them transition back to their sleeping routine. As far as flavor, i cant comment since we didn't try it personally. But as for the result.. kids do sleep faster. They also sleep well throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: AUTISTIC CHILD
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is autistic and come bedtime it is really hard to calm her down and get her relaxed to fall asleep. We were struggling every night with her at bedtime as well as though the night. We followed the directions and gave it to her 30-45 minutes before bedtime. Not only did she fall asleep quickly but also stayed asleep all through the night! I finally got a good nights sleep!! I praise this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but....
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it says it will do! My son is 6 and due to the schedule being thrown off he would be in bed by 8:30 and asleep by 3am YES 3am! We used these ONE time only to get him to bed on time so he would wake up early. I do NOT recommend giving them the recommended dose. The box suggested 2 pills we gave our son one and he was out like a light. I couldn't imagine giving him 2 pills. My opinion I felt like I drugged our son it made me feel uncomfortable watching him get so drowsy. The one time was enough for him to quickly get back on schedule 📅
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: This product is safe for kids and it really works
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving my three daughters these the two oldest are 10&8 yrs old they take two and within 30minutes I see that they are starting to yawn... I give this also to my 3yr old and she is a night owl .. I usually give her only one Gummy around 8:30pm and she is out by 9:00pm she usually goes to bed at 1am so this has helped me so much and she sleeps through the night ❤️ I would definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia PLAVULJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product-I don’t wake up groggy
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this for myself because many melatonin supplements leave me groggy in the morning. I have used it twice now and have quickly fallen asleep and stay asleep throughout the night! I wake up refreshed and rested. I really like this brand overall and have used other products in the past. My only semi negative comment is the flavor. Really not that bad but it’s very sweet (overwhelms the “natural berry” flavor). However, if you are purchasing this for your kids, I’m sure they will love it! Excellent product, I will purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Myhree

customer_reviews.title: Works for my 3 year old in 40 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would hit quicker than it did. Lord knows i needed it to, but I noticed it kicks in at about 40 minutes. My son never stays asleep with it though. I'll give it to him at 8:20, he'll sleep from 9-11 then wake up and he's ready to start his day. He does fall back asleep easier afterwards, but he never stays asleep. This is the only sleep product I've used for him so I'm not sure what's to be expected as far as sleep quality.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: This product works like a charm. I like that it comes in such a small dose.
customer_reviews.text: This product works like a charm. I like that it comes in such a small dose. We actually split the pill in her because her daughter is so small. But it is still effective for her. Our use melatonin myself for years and saw no side effects from it. I see no side effects with my daughter as well. I don’t use it every night I only use it as needed as with any other supplement/medicine.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Likable grape taste
customer_reviews.text: My daughter doesn’t like the gummies’ taste nor texture but she likes these as they are small, grape flavored tabs. Have worked good for helping her improve her sleep schedule as she’s autistic and would stay up nearly all night! Now she goes to bed at a decent time and is able to sleep through the night most of the time now that she has started school. I would also recommend if your kiddo has food texture sensitivities, since I know some kids don’t like the gummies or the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Dee H.

customer_reviews.title: Helped my two year old fall to sleep fast!
customer_reviews.text: This helped my 26 month old who fights sleep and just cannot wind down til 1030pm, to fall asleep at 830pm, a half hour after giving a dose (single gummy). I was hesitant to use, but my pediatrician advised using it for a short time to help her establish more suitable circadian rhythm. It doesn’t keep her asleep all night though, it just promotes restful sleep to start happening/ helps establish a routine of good sleep hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hart
